## Type of change

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added or updated; `mix test` passes
- [ ] Code formatted with `mix format`
- [ ] Credo passes: `mix credo`
- [ ] Dialyzer passes: `mix dialyzer` (if you changed lib code)
- [ ] Docs updated (e.g. `@doc` / `@moduledoc`) if the change is user-facing
